description:
When you're young, with the world against you, what do you latch onto before being engulfed by the darkness?

An anxious teen lives isolated. Consumed by the 70" screen solely furnishing his room; he has been weaponised. The device he 3D-printed in blind hope of solving his issues in a turbulent city was condemned by his friend. His ignorant actions driven by tranced intoxication leads him down an accelerated path of revelation, LSD, Canary Wharf and self-destruction.

- Writer, Director & Editor			Lucas Taberna
- Producer & Cinematographer		Jun Whittle
- Original Soundtrack				Michael McCormick
- Consultant Editor				Susan Steinberg
- Colour Grading				Alland Hemerashid
- Sound Mixing					Ade Pressly
- Additional Sound Mixing			Samson Timmer
- Additional VFX				Retics Digital

- Actors in Order of Appearance		Noah Perkins
							Finn Langron-Cumming
							Arnaldo Fioretto

- Production assistants				Kobi Ajavon Baron Cohen
							Hope Florin
							Felix Fuller-Kurley
							Nita Krasniqi
							Finn Langron-Cumming
							Anna Webb Chivite
							Jack White
